events.name: change
events.description: Emitted on lazy model value change (after user slides then releases the thumb)
events.description_zh: 在延迟模型值更改时发出（在用户滑动然后释放拇指后）

events.name: pan
events.description: Triggered when user starts panning on the component
events.description_zh: 当用户开始在组件上平移时触发

v-model.description: Model of the component of type { min, max } (both values must be between global min/max); Either use this property (along with a listener for 'update:modelValue' event) OR use v-model directive
v-model.description_zh: { min， max } 类型的组件模型（两个值必须介于全局 min/max 之间）;使用此属性（以及 update：modelValue' 事件的侦听器）或使用 v-model 指令
v-model.desc: Model of the component of type { min, max } (both values must be between global min/max); Either use this property (along with a listener for 'update:modelValue' event) OR use v-model directive

drag-range.description: User can drag range instead of just the two thumbs
drag-range.description_zh: 用户可以拖动范围，而不仅仅是两个滑块

drag-only-range.description: User can drag only the range instead and NOT the two thumbs
drag-only-range.description_zh: 用户只能拖动范围，而不能拖动两个滑块

left-label-color.description: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette
left-label-color.desc: Color name for the selection bar (can be 'transparent' too) from the Quasar Color Palette
left-label-color.description_zh: Quasar Color Palette （类星体调色板） 中组件的颜色名称

left-label-text-color.description: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette
left-label-text-color.desc: Color name for the selection bar (can be 'transparent' too) from the Quasar Color Palette
left-label-text-color.description_zh: Quasar Color Palette （类星体调色板） 中组件的颜色名称

right-label-color.description: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette
right-label-color.desc: Color name for the selection bar (can be 'transparent' too) from the Quasar Color Palette
right-label-color.description_zh: Quasar Color Palette （类星体调色板） 中组件的颜色名称

right-label-text-color.description: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette
right-label-text-color.desc: Color name for the selection bar (can be 'transparent' too) from the Quasar Color Palette
right-label-text-color.description_zh: Quasar Color Palette （类星体调色板） 中组件的颜色名称

left-label-value.description: Override default label for min value
left-label-value.description_zh: 覆盖最小值的默认标签

right-label-value.description: Override default label for max value
right-label-value.description_zh: 覆盖最大值的默认标签

left-thumb-color.description: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette
left-thumb-color.desc: Color name for the selection bar (can be 'transparent' too) from the Quasar Color Palette
left-thumb-color.description_zh: Quasar Color Palette （类星体调色板） 中组件的颜色名称

right-thumb-color.description: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette
right-thumb-color.desc: Color name for the selection bar (can be 'transparent' too) from the Quasar Color Palette
right-thumb-color.description_zh: Quasar Color Palette （类星体调色板） 中组件的颜色名称

min.description: Minimum value of the model; Set track's minimum value
min.description_zh: 模型的最小值;设置轨迹的最小值

max.description: Maximum value of the model; Set track's maximum value
max.description_zh: 模型的最大值;设置轨迹的最大值

inner-min.description: Inner minimum value of the model; Use in case you need the model value to be inside of the track's min-max values; Needs to be higher or equal to 'min' prop; Defaults to 'min' prop
inner-min.description_zh: 模型的内部最小值;如果您需要 model 值位于轨迹的 min-max 值范围内，请使用 view;需要高于或等于 'min' prop;默认为 'min' prop

inner-max.description: Inner maximum value of the model; Use in case you need the model value to be inside of the track's min-max values; Needs to be lower or equal to 'max' prop; Defaults to 'max' prop
inner-max.description_zh: 模型的内部最大值;如果您需要 model 值位于轨迹的 min-max 值范围内，请使用 view;需要小于或等于 'max' prop;默认为 'max' prop

step.description: Specify step amount between valid values (> 0.0); When step equals to 0 it defines infinite granularity
step.description_zh: 指定有效值之间的步长量 （> 0.0）;当 step 等于 0 时，它定义无限粒度

snap.description: Snap on valid values, rather than sliding freely; Suggestion: use with 'step' prop
snap.description_zh: 捕捉有效值，而不是自由滑动;建议：与 'step' prop 一起使用

color.description: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette
color.desc: Color name for the selection bar (can be 'transparent' too) from the Quasar Color Palette
color.description_zh: Quasar Color Palette （类星体调色板） 中组件的颜色名称

track-color.description: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette
track-color.desc: Color name for the selection bar (can be 'transparent' too) from the Quasar Color Palette
track-color.description_zh: Quasar Color Palette （类星体调色板） 中组件的颜色名称

track-img.description: Apply a pattern image on the track
track-img.description_zh: 在轨道上应用样式图像

inner-track-color.description: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette
inner-track-color.desc: Color name for the selection bar (can be 'transparent' too) from the Quasar Color Palette
inner-track-color.description_zh: Quasar Color Palette （类星体调色板） 中组件的颜色名称

inner-track-img.description: Apply a pattern image on the inner track
inner-track-img.description_zh: 在内部轨道上应用样式图像

selection-color.description: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette
selection-color.desc: Color name for the selection bar (can be 'transparent' too) from the Quasar Color Palette
selection-color.description_zh: Quasar Color Palette （类星体调色板） 中组件的颜色名称

selection-img.description: Apply a pattern image on the selection bar
selection-img.description_zh: 在选择栏上应用图案图像

label.description: Popup a label when user clicks/taps on the slider thumb and moves it
label.description_zh: 当用户单击/点击滑块并移动它时弹出标签

label-color.description: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette
label-color.desc: Color name for the selection bar (can be 'transparent' too) from the Quasar Color Palette
label-color.description_zh: Quasar Color Palette （类星体调色板） 中组件的颜色名称

label-text-color.description: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette
label-text-color.desc: Color name for the selection bar (can be 'transparent' too) from the Quasar Color Palette
label-text-color.description_zh: Quasar Color Palette （类星体调色板） 中组件的颜色名称

switch-label-side.description: Switch the position of the label (top <-> bottom or left <-> right)
switch-label-side.description_zh: 切换标签的位置（顶部 <-> 底部或左侧<->右侧）

markers.description: Display markers on the track, one for each possible value for the model or using a custom step (when specifying a Number)
markers.description_zh: 在轨道上显示标记，模型的每个可能值对应一个标记，或使用自定义步骤（指定 Number 时）

marker-labels.description: Configure the marker labels (or show the default ones if 'true'); Array of definition Objects or Object with key-value where key is the model and the value is the marker label definition
marker-labels.description_zh: 配置标记标签（如果为 'true'，则显示默认标签）;定义数组 对象 或具有键值的对象，其中 key 是模型，value 是标记标签定义

marker-labels-class.description: CSS class(es) to apply to the marker labels container
marker-labels-class.description_zh: 要应用于标记标签容器的 CSS 类

switch-marker-labels-side.description: Switch the position of the marker labels (top <-> bottom or left <-> right)
switch-marker-labels-side.description_zh: 切换标记标签的位置（顶部<->底部或左侧<->右侧）

track-size.description_zh: 轨道大小（包括 CSS 单元）

thumb-size.description_zh: 缩略图大小（包括 CSS 单位）

thumb-color.description: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette
thumb-color.desc: Color name for the selection bar (can be 'transparent' too) from the Quasar Color Palette
thumb-color.description_zh: Quasar Color Palette （类星体调色板） 中组件的颜色名称

thumb-path.description_zh: 设置自定义 Thumb svg 路径

slots.name: marker-label
slots.description: What should the menu display after filtering options and none are left to be displayed; Suggestion: <div>
slots.description_zh: 筛选选项后菜单应该显示什么，并且没有要显示的内容;建议： <div>

slots.name: marker-label-group
slots.description: What should the menu display after filtering options and none are left to be displayed; Suggestion: <div>
slots.description_zh: 筛选选项后菜单应该显示什么，并且没有要显示的内容;建议： <div>
